title: People Generation brings large lantern festival to United States
text:

People Generation brings large lantern festival to United States 1 / 2 Back to Gallery The 2015 Magical Winter Lights, founded and produced by People Generation Global Communications, will debut in Houston this winter from Nov. 20 to Jan. 10, 2016 at Sam Houston Race Park.
The 52-day festival will become one of the largest holiday lighting events in Houston, and one of the largest lantern festivals of its kind to ever take place in the U.S.
People Generation's partner, China Zigong Lantern Festival & Trade Co., one of the top lantern companies in Zigong that is also known as the "Lantern Town in the South Kingdom," will use more than 100 lantern sets at the 2015 Magical Winter Lights festival. With a joint investment of more than $10 million by its partner, Sichuan PG Salient Cultural Trade Co., the festival will set a precedent in terms of scale and design of all lantern festivals ever hosted in the U.S.
"Magical Winter Lights aims to create a brand new holiday light show experience to Houstonians of all ages," said Yusi C. An, founder and president of People Generation. "We are excited to partner with a top-notch lantern company from China to start a new holiday tradition for Houston families for many years to come, and in more cities throughout the U.S. in the future."
Magical Winter Lights differentiates itself from other more traditional holiday lighting events by basing its designs on Chinese lanterns and transforming them into larger-than-life remakes of well-known landmarks and landscapes in the world. The festival will feature seven fascinating themed sections including Magical, Europe, America, Asia, Oceania, Africa and the Animal Kingdom. The America section will display lantern sets that Houstonians and Texans can easily relate to, including their hometown sports teams, Western stockyards and the Houston skyline.
Magical Winter Lights also is one of the first lantern festivals to experiment with interactive lantern sets. Festival goers will get to enjoy live performances as part of the lantern display or walk inside of the delicate lantern sets that bring out an experience beyond a visual feast.
Carnival rides and games, international and local food vendors, cultural performances and exhibitors featuring Chinese intangible cultural heritage crafts also will be offered at the 2015 Magical Winter Lights. To become a vendor or a sponsor, visit www.peoplegeneration.com or call 713-496-0556.
About People Generation People Generation is a global communications firm with a specialization in communication strategies between the U.S. and China and the production of large festivals, expos and cultural performances.
The company has also worked closely with many U.S. businesses to improve their communications strategies and marketing efforts.
